(Please tick one box only.)

Q8
There has been a lot of discussion about the world’s climate and the idea it has been changing in recent decades. Which of the following statements comes closest to your opinion?
(Please tick one box only.)
(IF CODE 1: GO TO Q10)
(IF CODE 2-4,-8: GO TO Q9a)

answer.1: The world's climate has not been changing
answer.2: The world's climate has been changing mostly due to natural processes
answer.3: The world's climate has been changing about equally due to natural processes and human activity
answer.4: The world's climate has been changing mostly due to human activity

question:

0 means extremely bad, 10 means extremely good.
(Please tick one box only.)

question:
Q14a
Which of these approaches do you think would be the best way of getting business and industry in [COUNTRY] to protect the environment?
(Please tick one box only.)

answer.1: Heavy fines for businesses that damage the environment
answer.2: Use the tax system to reward businesses that protect the environment
answer.3: More information and education for businesses about the advantages of protecting the environment

question:

Which of these approaches do you think would be the best way of getting people and their families in [COUNTRY] to protect the environment?
(Please tick one box only.)

answer.1: Heavy fines for people who damage the environment
answer.2: Use the tax system to reward people who protect the environment
answer.3: More information and education for people about the advantages of protecting the environment
